caption.p: Single-step reaction vs chemo-enzymatic approach. (A) The SNAP- tag 速 technology is based on BG-derivatives singularly synthetised and purified, and not excluding that the conjugated chemical group ( green sphere) could affect the enzymatic reaction rate. (B) The SNAP- tag 速 technology revised uses a unique and universal azide BG-derivative, converting SNAP- tag 速 in a clickable form, prone to perform a fast and efficient cycloaddition with DBCO-based chemical groups. POI, protein of interest genetically fused to the SNAP- tag 速.
